creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: hair sleeve of black fabric with multi-colored embroidered flowers; at one end: rows of embroidery with beads, metal discs and fringe which has tiny beads at the end; braided strap at one end
dimension: 45 x 6 1/4 in. (114.3 x 15.88 cm) (excluding fringe and tie)
title: Hair sleeve
